name: In re Nominating Petition of Esther M. LEE for the Position of Representative in the General Assembly of District No. 135-Democrat. Petition of Daniel James ANDERS, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: In re Nominating Petition of Lee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: In re Nominating Petition of Esther M. LEE for the Position of Representative in the General Assembly of District No. 135—Democrat. Petition of Daniel James ANDERS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The decision of the Commonwealth court is reversed. Opinion to follow.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
573 A.2d 1026
In re Nominating Petition of Esther M. LEE for the Position of Representative in the General Assembly of District No. 135—Democrat. Petition of Daniel James ANDERS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 7, 1990.
Decided May 10, 1990.
Glennis L. Clark, for petitioner.
Michele A. Varricchio, for respondent:
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
